summary: Feature request to support Payloads for ApplicationFailure message and stack trace fields instead of plain text, enabling encryption of sensitive application information through custom data converters.
userImpact: Users cannot currently encrypt sensitive error messages and stack traces in ApplicationFailure, risking exposure of sensitive application information.
proposedFix: Add the ability to use Payloads for ApplicationFailure message and stack trace fields so they could be encrypted with a custom data converter
keyQuote: Add the ability to use Payloads for these so they could be encrypted with a custom data converter
